projects.title: MNIST Digit Recognition
projects.description: Handwritten digit classifier using a high-accuracy CNN model
highlights: Trained a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) achieving 99.5% accuracy on the MNIST dataset
Built an interactive web application with a React frontend and Flask API for real-time digit prediction

projects.title: CineMatch
projects.description: Intelligent movie recommendation system powered by ML
highlights: Built a recommendation system using machine learning algorithms to suggest movies based on user interests
Developed a modern web platform using React and TypeScript

projects.title: Nexova
projects.description: Intelligent IoT-powered platform automating industrial processes
highlights: Developed a backend system with TypeScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to process real-time IoT sensor data
Designed RESTful APIs enabling seamless integration with frontend and IoT devices

projects.title: ExpenseTracker Mobile App
projects.description: Android application for secure personal expense tracking
highlights: Developed a mobile application for secure expense tracking using Java
Integrated SQLite for offline data storage and efficient data management

projects.title: QuizNight
projects.description: Full-stack quiz game platform with real-time interaction
highlights: Developed a full-stack quiz game platform with dynamic user interaction
Implemented user management, scoring system, leaderboards, and custom quiz creation

projects.title: Journal App
projects.description: Mobile journal app for managing personal entries
highlights: Created a mobile journal app allowing users to add, view, and edit personal entries

projects.title: Messaging System
projects.description: Linux-based messaging server built in C
highlights: Built a messaging server in C enabling users to create accounts and exchange messages
